data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in River Nile, Sudan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of River Nile, Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in River Nile to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of River Nile against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of River Nile, Sudan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in River Nile, Sudan and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, move the 3,903 believers in the state of River Nile to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the state of River Nile, Sudan has a population of 1,008,500.

We estimate River Nile has 3,903 people who might know Jesus, 46,372 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 958,224 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to River Nile, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
